name: 華國媛
objective:
基礎生物化學，是從認識動、植物和細菌細胞到脂質、蛋白質和DNA和醣類構造及其功能關係。
This is a beginner class for undergraduate students.  The course is to teach students to understand the molecular basis of biochemistry.
schedule:
1　　What is biochemistry?
2　　Cell Structure
3　　Water/ Engergy
4　　Nucleic Acid
5　　Genetic Information
6　　Protein Synthesis
7　　Amino Acid, Peptides and Protein
8　　Enzyme Quiz 1
9　　Mid Term Exam *
10　　Protein Purification 1
11　　Protein Purification 2
12　　Carbohydrates
13　　Carbohydrate Metabolism Quiz 2
14　　Aerobic Metabolism
15　　Lipid & Membrane & its metabolism
16　　Nitrogen metabolism Quiz 3
17　　Integration of Metabolism
18　　Final Exam
scorePolicy: Grade: Quiz 30%, Mid-term 30%, Final Exam 30%, in-class, 10% (-5% for each of absence)
materials: Biochemistry- the molecular basis of life, 3rd edition, 2003, ed: Trudy McKee & James R. Mckee, McGraw-Hill
